data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Chukot, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chukot, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Chukot, Russia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 28,120 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Chukot, Russia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Nganasan, Tavgi Samoyed people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the 733 believers in Chukot to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Chukot, Russia to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chukot, Russia has a population of 50,100.

We estimate Chukot has 733 people who might know Jesus, 28,120 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 21,247 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Chukot, Russia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
